name: City Bus Driver Simulator
description:
Next station: Green st.

Dear passengers, please take the seats provided. Does that sound familiar? Try what it's like to be a real bus driver.

In this bus simulator, your mission is to be the best bus driver simulator and to be on time each time. Even if you will have a route to drive, we guarantee that it will not be boring. Every day you will meet all kinds of passengers that you have to pick up from one station and take them to other stations.

Are you ready for such challenges? Put on your uniform, start the engine and start your career right now!

Game features :
- 3 types of buses
- 10 levels
- GPS Assistant
